entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Data.OleDb.OleDbException.Errors property not being populated with the OleDbError #100501
  • Failed test: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester #100495
  • Performance difference between 2 code patterns doing same thing #100493
    Future
  • [wasm-wasi]: release build fails, debug build succeeds #100488
    9.0.0
  • Does NativeAOT have its own API, with which it gets the names of methods and their addresses for Stacktrace? #100486
  • Question: how to pass string pointer without Marshal to NativeAOT dylib ? #100481
  • How to implement c++ VARINET Type in C# #100480
  • performance: In a case, dotnet 8.0 is slower than java 22. #100479
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer.Deserialize(ReadOnlySequence) #100478
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #100477
  • Test failure: ValueFactory attempted to access the Value property of this instance. #100476
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt. #100475
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Convert Remaining Tests to the Merged Wrapper System #97486
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Enable support for IsByRefLike types in generics #94415
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ExecuteOnlySpan<T> #100485
  • [API Proposal]: WriteOnlySpan<T> #100302
  • .NET Core 3.0 and plugin scenario - Assembly.LoadFrom fails when an older version of dependency assembly has already been loaded #13471
    Future
  • Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow timeout win arm64 gcstress #100492
  • [wasm] `Assertion: should not be reached at D:/a/_work/1/s/src/mono/mono/sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:93` in `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` #95805
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestAllWithReload` failing with `Expected to only pause because of an exception.` #95943
  • [wasm] AOT tests *build* timing out on Linux #97044
  • The type initializer sometimes doesn't execute for an empty struct #100466
  • [API Proposal]: `Parallel.ForEachTaskAsync` #100482

PullRequests

Created

  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Cache Values Guard #100502
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Fix origin for warnings due to event methods #100500
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update JIT sources to clang-format/clang-tidy 17.0.6 #100498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • enable AutomaticOrManual_DoesntFailRegardlessOfWhetherClientCertsAreAvailable test #100496
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • Make JitOptRepeat available in Release builds #100494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #100491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix more diagnostics with CA2263 #100490
    area-Meta
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

Merged

  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix non-deterministic trigger of struct type initializers #100469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build win-x86 NativeAOT runtime pack #100195
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use SoftFP ABI on linux-bionic-arm #100392
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add OptRepeat phase start/end indications #100471
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Force 2 iterations of OptRepeat #100473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Remove various single-scenario YAML parameters in our build scripts and shift implementation responsibility to those scenarios #100115
    area-Infrastructure
  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix typo in extractor.cpp #98940
    area-Single-File, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix error propagation when calling JSImport of missing JS function #100408
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing and remove prepare-artifacts.proj #100004
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #100372
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] disableManagedTransition on UI thread after start #100410
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fixed: potential null reference in XmlTreeGen when DataSet not defined #99306
    area-System.Data
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
